overview: Planetary alignment. Convergence of the struggles. Emerald, Jasmine and Indra predict the future of the lost souls on Psychic TV, one of the most secluded TV channel. Love, work, luck, they bring support to all the people that society hurt. When Emerald receive a phone call from Christelle, a harassement victim who is convinced to be cursed, her own destiny swings.
title: Knightesses of the Zodiaque
